---
title: "China Pharma R user group meeting 2026"
---

THE 4th China Pharmaceutical Industry R User Group (RUG) Meeting will be held on March 27, 2026, both on-site and online. On-site meeting locations: Shanghai (J&J campus), Beijing (BeOne office). 

第四届中国医药行业R用户大会将于2026年3月27日召开。线上线下同步进行。线下会议地点：上海（强生园区），北京（百济办公室）。

| Key dates                 |                                    |
| ------------------------- | ---------------------------------- |
| 13-Dec-2025               | Call for Papers Opens              |
| 28-Feb-2026               | Call for Papers Closes             |
| 1 to 7-March-2026         | Acceptance Notices send to Authors |
| 3-Feb-2026                | Conference Registration Opens      |
| 14-Mar-2026               | Conference Registration Closes     |
| 21-Mar-2026               | Final Papers/Slides Due            |
| 27-Mar-2026               | China Pharma R User Group meeting  |


Conference chair: Xiaochang Liu (J&J), Shuang Gao (BeOne)
